Header: Hemasiri Fernando, President’s new Chief of Staff
Content: Hemasiri Fernando has been appointed as the Presidential Chief of Staff. Hemasiri Fernando received his letter of appointment from President Maithripala Sirisena at the President’s Office this morning. Hemasiri Fernando who is the Chairman of the People’s Bank had also served as the Secretary to former Prime Minister Sirimavo Bandaranaike. Hemasiri Fernando who was the Chairman of the National Olympic Committee and the Independent Television Media Network, is a veteran in the administrative field.
